citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:19pm on
27-Aug-19.
Contact was made with the husband of the licensee who informed me that the licensee has taken an evening job
and was unavailable.
